verses.text: \w And|strong="H0453"\w* Eliu \w continued|strong="H0559"\w* \w his|strong="H0559"\w* discourse, \w and|strong="H0453"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye, \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w men|strong="H2450"\w*, \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H4405"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* ye \w learned|strong="H3045"\w*, hearken \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H3045"\w*:

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* trieth \w words|strong="H4405"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w mouth|strong="H2441"\w* discerneth meats \w by|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w taste|strong="H2938"\w*.

Let \w us|strong="H3045"\w* \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* \w to|strong="H0977"\w* \w us|strong="H3045"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* let \w us|strong="H3045"\w* \w see|strong="H3045"\w* \w among|strong="H0996"\w* \w ourselves|strong="H0996"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H0996"\w* \w best|strong="H2896"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w Job|strong="H0347"\w* hath \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w just|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* hath overthrown \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* judging \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w there|strong="H1097"\w* \w is|strong="H4941"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w lie|strong="H3576"\w*: \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w arrow|strong="H2671"\w* \w is|strong="H4941"\w* violent \w without|strong="H1097"\w* any sin.

\w What|strong="H4310"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* there \w like|strong="H3933"\w* \w Job|strong="H0347"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* drinketh \w up|strong="H8354"\w* scorning \w like|strong="H3933"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*?

\w Who|strong="H0376"\w* goeth \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w company|strong="H2274"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0376"\w* \w work|strong="H6466"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* walketh \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w wicked|strong="H0205"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*?

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Man|strong="H1397"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w please|strong="H7521"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w although|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* run \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w*, ye \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w understanding|strong="H3824"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H2486"\w*: \w far|strong="H2486"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w god|strong="H0410"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* render \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w work|strong="H6467"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w according|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w ways|strong="H0734"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w reward|strong="H7999"\w* \w them|strong="H4672"\w*.

\w For|strong="H4941"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* very deed \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w condemn|strong="H7561"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w cause|strong="H4941"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w pervert|strong="H5791"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w What|strong="H4310"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* hath \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w appointed|strong="H6485"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*? \w or|strong="H0776"\w* \w whom|strong="H4310"\w* hath \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w world|strong="H8398"\w* \w which|strong="H4310"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w*?

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w turn|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* draw \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* unto \w himself|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w shall|strong="H1320"\w* \w perish|strong="H1478"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w shall|strong="H1320"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w ashes|strong="H6083"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w then|strong="H8085"\w* thou hast \w understanding|strong="H0998"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w what|strong="H6963"\w* \w is|strong="H6963"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* hearken \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H4405"\w*.

\w Can|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w be|strong="H6662"\w* healed \w that|strong="H0518"\w* loveth \w not|strong="H0518"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*? \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w how|strong="H0637"\w* dost thou \w so|strong="H0637"\w* far \w condemn|strong="H7561"\w* \w him|strong="H8130"\w* \w that|strong="H0518"\w* \w is|strong="H6662"\w* \w just|strong="H4941"\w*?

\w Who|strong="H4428"\w* saith \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: Thou art \w an|strong="H0559"\w* apostate: \w who|strong="H4428"\w* calleth rulers \w ungodly|strong="H7563"\w*?

\w Who|strong="H0834"\w* accepteth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* persons \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*: \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w regarded|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* tyrant, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* contended \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w suddenly|strong="H7281"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* troubled \w at|strong="H4191"\w* midnight, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w take|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* violent \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* considereth \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w steps|strong="H6806"\w*.

\w There|strong="H8033"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w shadow|strong="H6757"\w* \w of|strong="H6466"\w* \w death|strong="H6757"\w*, \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w may|strong="H0205"\w* \w be|strong="H0369"\w* \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* \w who|strong="H0369"\w* \w work|strong="H6466"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w power|strong="H0410"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w enter|strong="H1980"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* break \w in|strong="H5975"\w* pieces many \w and|strong="H5975"\w* innumerable, \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H5975"\w* \w others|strong="H0312"\w* \w to|strong="H5975"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H5975"\w* \w their|strong="H8478"\w* \w stead|strong="H8478"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* knoweth \w their|strong="H2015"\w* \w works|strong="H4566"\w*: \w and|strong="H3915"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* shall bring \w night|strong="H3915"\w* on \w them|strong="H5234"\w*, \w and|strong="H3915"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* shall \w be|strong="H3915"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H2015"\w*.
\w He|strong="H7200"\w* hath \w struck|strong="H5606"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*, \w as|strong="H8478"\w* being \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, \w in|strong="H4725"\w* open sight.

\w Who|strong="H0834"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* purpose \w have|strong="H0834"\w* revolted \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w would|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w understand|strong="H7919"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*:

\w So|strong="H0935"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* caused \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cry|strong="H6818"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w needy|strong="H6041"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* voice \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w when|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* granteth \w peace|strong="H8252"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* there \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w condemn|strong="H7561"\w*? \w When|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* hideth \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* there \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w behold|strong="H7789"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, whether \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w regard|strong="H5921"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w or|strong="H0120"\w* \w all|strong="H3162"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w*?

\w Who|strong="H0120"\w* maketh a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* that \w is|strong="H0120"\w* a hypocrite \w to|strong="H0120"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w for|strong="H4170"\w* \w the|strong="H5971"\w* sins \w of|strong="H4170"\w* \w the|strong="H5971"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*?

\w Seeing|strong="H3588"\w* \w then|strong="H5375"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w spoken|strong="H0559"\w* \w of|strong="H0410"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* hinder thee \w in|strong="H0413"\w* thy turn.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* erred, \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* thou \w me|strong="H3254"\w*: \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* spoken \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w*, \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w add|strong="H3254"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w*.

Doth \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w require|strong="H0977"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3045"\w* thee, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* hath displeased thee? \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thou begannest \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w any|strong="H3588"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w* better, \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*.

Let \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w understanding|strong="H3824"\w* \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H3824"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* let \w a|strong="H8085"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* hearken \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H3824"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w Job|strong="H0347"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* foolishly, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* sound \w not|strong="H3808"\w* discipline.

\w My|strong="H5921"\w* father, let \w Job|strong="H0347"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w tried|strong="H0974"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w end|strong="H5331"\w*: cease not \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* addeth blasphemy \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*, let \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H3254"\w* tied fast \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* mean time amongst \w us|strong="H5921"\w*: \w and|strong="H3254"\w* \w then|strong="H3254"\w* let \w him|strong="H5921"\w* provoke \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* judgment \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* speeches.
